tika-s0303t0:219_5: Ruppatīti ettha rūpaṃ nāma sītādivirodhipaccayasannipātena visadisuppatti.
tika-s0303t0:219_8: so pana tattha accuggato pākāro viya ṭhito.
tika-s0303t0:219_9: Tathā hi tattha sattā olambantā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0303t0:219_14: Accantakhāre udaketi ātapasantāpābhāvena atisītabhāvameva sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā.
tika-s0303t0:219_15: Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhānaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavīsandhārakaṃ kappavināsaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati,
tika-s0303t0:220_0: Avīcimahānirayeti saussadaṃ avīcinirayaṃ vuttaṃ. Gaṅgāpiṭṭheti gaṅgātīre.
tika-s0303t0:223_4: Uppajjanasaññāpīti yaṃ kiñci nīlaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ ārabbha uppajjanasaññāpi,
tika-s0303t0:224_4: Evanti yathā yāguādivatthuṃ puriso yāguādiatthāya pacati nipphādeti,
tika-s0303t0:224_5: ayaṃ evaṃ ruppanādisabhāve dhammasamūhe yathāsakaṃ paccayehi abhisaṅkhariyamāne cetanāpadhāno dhammasamūho
tika-s0303t0:224_6: pavattanatthaṃ visesapaccayo hutvā te abhisaṅkharoti niropeti nibbatteti.
tika-s0303t0:224_10: Abhisaṅkharotīti itarehi paccayadhammehi adhikaṃ suṭṭhu paccayataṃ karoti.
tika-s0303t0:224_13: Nibbattetīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ruppanādibhāvena nibbattiyā paccayo hotīti attho.
tika-s0303t0:224_14: Cetayitalakkhaṇassa saṅkhārassāti idaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ cetanāpadhānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:224_15: Tathā hi bhagavā suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena cetanāva vibhattā.
tika-s0303t0:226_10: Tathā hi sañjānanapadaṃ paccabhiññāṇanimittaṃ ākāragahaṇamattaṃ bodheti,
tika-s0303t0:226_12: Pajānanapadaṃ pana tatopi visiṭṭhataraṃ pakārato avabodhaṃ bodheti.
tika-s0303t0:226_17: Ñāṇasampayuttacittehi vipassantassa vipassanāya paguṇabhāve sati ñāṇavippayuttena cittenapi vipassanā
tika-s0303t0:226_24: evaṃ viññāṇavijānanavasena vāyaṃ anurūpavaseneva pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:227_3: Lokavohāre ajātā asañjātā buddhi etassāti ajātabuddhi,
tika-s0303t0:227_11: Ettha ca yathā heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ cittādibhāvato uddhaṃ kūṭādibhāvaṃ rūpadassanādivasena uppattiṭṭhānatopi jānanto anekākārato jānāti,
tika-s0303t0:227_12: evaṃ paññā ārammaṇaṃ nānappakārato jānāti paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0303t0:227_13: tāya saddhiṃ pavattamānaviññāṇampi yathāvisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0303t0:228_0: Evaṃ svāyaṃ nesaṃ jānane viseso aññesaṃ avisayo,
tika-s0303t0:228_1: buddhānaṃ eva visayoti idaṃ visesaṃ milindapañhena vibhāvetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0303t0:229_0: Attasuññānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya kathitattā “anattalakkhaṇaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:229_4: itarāni dve lakkhaṇāni tassa parihārabhāvenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t0:230_1: bhikkhave”tiādidesanāya tīsu lakkhaṇesu idameva padhānabhāvena dassitaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:230_4: Apacinātīti apacayagāmidhamme nivatteti ekaṃsato apacayagāmipaṭipadāya paripūraṇato.
tika-s0303t0:230_11: Vidhūpetīti vaṭṭattayasaṅkhātaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ vigatadhūmaṃ vigatasantāpaṃ karotīti atthoti āha “nibbāpetī”ti.
tika-s0303t0:231_0: Evaṃ passantiādi anāgāmiphale ṭhitassa ariyasāvakassa aggamaggaphalādhigamāya desanāti adhippāyenāha
tika-s0303t0:231_4: sahapaṭhamamaggā vā sahavijjūpamadhammā vā vipassanākathāti dassento “ettakena ṭhānenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t0:232_2: Tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “āyasmantaṃ nītattheraṃ viyā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “thero”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t0:232_3: Tattha khuraggeyevāti kesoropanatthaṃ khuradhārāya agge sīse ṭhapite tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānamukhena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto arahattaṃ patvā.
tika-s0303t0:235_5: Tathākaraṇañca evamete ettakampi appaṭirūpaṃ akatvā āyatiṃ sammā paṭipajjissantīti.
tika-s0303t0:236_0: Ekadvīhikāyāti ekekassa ceva dvinnaṃ dvinnañca īhikā gati upasaṅkamanā ekadvīhikā.
tika-s0303t0:236_1: Tenāha “ekeko ceva dve dve ca hutvā”ti.
tika-s0303t0:236_2: Puthujjanānaṃ samuditānaṃ nāma kiriyā tādisīpi siyāti vuttaṃ “keḷimpi kareyyu”nti.
tika-s0303t0:236_3: Parikappanavasena sammāsambuddhaṃ uddissa pesalā bhikkhūpi evaṃ karontīti.
tika-s0303t0:237_2: patitaṃ yaṃ kiñcipi sīdantaranadiyaṃ vilīyantā sīdanteva,
tika-s0303t0:237_3: tasmā taṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā yugandharādayopi sīdapabbatā nāma.
tika-s0303t0:237_4: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sīdantare sannisinnaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0303t0:240_0: Eraṇḍo anto rukkhānaṃ, tayo antā samāgatā”ti. –
tika-s0303t0:241_4: Attho phalaṃ vaso etassāti atthavasaṃ, kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:243_3: Byāpādo hi uppajjamāno cittaṃ apagandhaṃ karoti,
tika-s0303t0:243_5: Bhattanikkhittakāko viyāti idaṃ bhattaṭṭhānassa asaraṇena kākassa naṭṭhasatitā paññāyatīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:244_3: itaro missakoti vattuṃ yuttanti adhippāyena “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:244_4: Evaṃ taṃ bhāventassa nirujjhanti evāti ekekamissakatāvasena gahetabbanti porāṇā.
tika-s0303t0:248_1: Satthā paribhogaṃ karoti anuggaṇhanto “evaṃ hissa duggatimokkho bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0303t0:249_2: Īsādantassa naṅgalasadisadantassa hatthino evaṃ cittaṃ sameti.
tika-s0303t0:251_3: sā ca anekadhā pavattā evāti vuttaṃ “vicayaso”ti,
tika-s0303t0:251_4: anekakkhattuṃ pavattamānāpi vicayo evāti katvā “vicayenā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0303t0:251_7: evaṃ koṭṭhāsato paricchijja desite mayā dhamme katamassa jānanassa antarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti ekaccassa kaṅkhā hotiyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t0:251_10: Tato eva taṇhāpaccayo hotīti vuttaṃ “tatojo so saṅkhāro”ti.
tika-s0303t0:251_11: Tato taṇhāto so saṅkhāro jātoti catūsu esa diṭṭhisaṅkhāro diṭṭhūpanissayo saṅkhāro jāyati.
tika-s0303t0:251_13: Evamettha bhagavā saḷāyatananāmarūpaviññāṇāni saṅkhārapakkhikāneva katvā dasseti.
tika-s0303t0:252_0: Ettake ṭhāneti “idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjano”tiādiṃ katvā yāva “na me bhavissatī”ti ettake ṭhāne.
tika-s0303t0:252_4: no ca me siyā”tiādinā pavattaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhinti tathā tathā gahitadiṭṭhiṃ. “Iti kho,
tika-s0303t0:252_7: Tattha tatthevāssa uppannadiṭṭhivivecanato imissā desanāya puggalajjhāsayena pavattitatā veditabbā,
tika-s0303t0:252_9: Tatojo so saṅkhāroti tato vicikicchāya paccayabhūtataṇhāto jāto vicikicchāya sampayutto saṅkhāro.
tika-s0303t0:252_10: Yadi sahajātādipaccayavasena tato taṇhāto jātoti tatojo saṅkhāroti vucceyya,
tika-s0303t0:252_13: Itaro upanissayakoṭi idhādhippetāti dassento “appahīnattā”ti vatvā “yassa hī”tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0303t0:252_15: Yadi asati sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā taṇhāpaccayā vicikicchāya sambhavo eva.
tika-s0303t0:252_18: Vīsati sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo sassatadiṭṭhiṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ vicikicchañca pakkhipitvā paccekaṃ aniccatāmukhena
tika-s0303t0:252_19: vipassanaṃ dassetvā arahattaṃ pāpetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitāti āha “tevīsatiyā ṭhānesū”tiādi.
tika-s0303t0:255_4: paṭhamaṃ pana sarūpaṃ pucchitvā puna tassa viseso pucchitabboti paṭhamaṃ “ime nu kho”tiādinā pucchaṃ karoti,
tika-s0303t0:255_5: idhāpi ca so viseso eva tassa bhikkhuno antanti dasseti.
tika-s0303t0:255_6: Ajānanto viya pucchati tesaṃ hetunti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t0:256_1: Pañcupādānakkhandhāti ettha visesato taṇhupādānassa gahaṇaṃ itarassa taggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ tadavinābhāvatoti chandarāgo eva uddhaṭo.
tika-s0303t0:256_3: Yadipi khandhā upādānehi asahajātāpi honti upādānassa anārammaṇabhūtāpi,
tika-s0303t0:256_6: Na hi asahajātaṃ anārammaṇañca upādānaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0303t0:256_10: “Evaṃrūpo siya”nti evaṃpavattassa chandarāgassa “evaṃvedano siya”nti evaṃpavattiyā abhāvato tattha tattheva natasaṅkhārā bhijjanti,
tika-s0303t0:256_11: tasmā rūpavedanārammaṇānaṃ chandarāgādīnaṃ abhāvato attheva chandarāgavemattatā.
tika-s0303t0:261_3: “seyyohamasmī”ti mānaggāho ca taṇhāvaseneva hontīti taṇhāpi tathāpavattiyā paccayabhūtā tathāpavatti
tika-s0303t0:261_4: evāti vuttaṃ “asmīti evaṃ pavattaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcattayaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0303t0:261_5: Daharasaddo bāladārakepi pavattatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “yuvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:261_6: Yuvāpi eko amaṇḍanasīloti tato visesanatthaṃ “maṇḍanakajātiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:261_9: Parammukhaṃ hutvā paññāyeyyāti yadi puratthimadisābhimukhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:261_12: tathāpi kāci asadisatā bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ “vaṇṇādīhi asadisaṃ hutvā paññāyeyyā”ti.
tika-s0303t0:261_14: Nibhāsarūpaṃ tāva kaṃsādimaye pabhassare maṇḍale paññāyatu,
tika-s0303t0:261_16: Itaro “mahābhūtānaṃ visuddhatāyā”ti vadanto tatthāpi yathāladdhapabhassarabhāvenevāti dasseti.
tika-s0303t0:261_17: Ettha ca maṇḍanajātiko puriso viya puthujjano,
tika-s0303t0:261_20: mukhanimittaṃ upādāya dissamānarūpādi viya “asmī”ti sati “ahamasmī”ti “parosmī”tiādayo gāhavisesā.
tika-s0303t0:264_6: Na pakkhāyantīti pakāsā hutvā na khāyanti.
tika-s0303t0:265_0: Kāmānametaṃ adhivacananti padaṃ uddharitvā yena adhippāyena bhagavatā ninnaṃ pallalaṃ kāmānaṃ nidassanabhāvena ābhataṃ,
tika-s0303t0:268_2: Diṭṭhigataṃ nāma jātaṃ khandhavinimuttassa sattassa gahitattā.
tika-s0303t0:269_1: Paggayhāti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike viya therassa sāriputtassa sammukhā attano laddhiṃ paggayha “evaṃ khvāha”nti evaṃ nicchayena vattuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0303t0:270_1: tassa attano gāhaṃ nijjhānakkhantiyāva yāthāvato pavedanaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:270_8: Vattabbākārena vadanto atthato arahattaṃ byākaronto nāma hotīti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-s0303t0:271_0: Etassa paṭhamamaggassāti etassa idāniyeva tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasāne tayā adhigatassa paṭhamamaggassa.
tika-s0303t0:271_1: Catūhi yogehīti attato piyato udāsinato veritoti catūhipi uppajjanaanatthayogehi.
tika-s0303t0:272_4: Paccatthikā me eteti ete rūpavedanādayo pañcupādānakkhandhā mayhaṃ paccatthikā anatthāvahattāti vipassanāñāṇena ñatvā.
tika-s0303t0:275_1: Tasseva vihārassāti mahāvane yasmiṃ vihāre bhagavā viharati,
tika-s0303t0:275_4: Yasmā ayaṃ thero ṭhapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ ṭhapanīyabhāvena na ṭhapesi, tasmā.
tika-s0303t0:276_4: Vaṭṭavivaṭṭamevāti pañcannaṃ pana khandhānaṃ samanupassanāya vasena vaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:279_1: Nagaramajjhe mahāābādho uppajjīti nagaramajjhena āgacchanto kammasamuṭṭhāno mahanto ābādho uppajjati.
tika-s0303t0:279_7: Satthu guṇasarīraṃ nāma navavidhalokuttaradhammādhigamamūlanti katvā vuttaṃ “navavidho hi…pe…
tika-s0303t0:280_5: Ekaṃ dve ñāṇānīti ekaṃ dve paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni sabhāvato avassaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0303t0:284_2: No ca svāhanti no ca su ahaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:284_7: Dukkhaṃ patvāti dukkhuppattihetu sukhaṃ pattheti “evaṃ me dukkhapariḷāho na bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0303t0:284_11: tasmā sukhaṃ abhinandanto atthato dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma.
tika-s0303t0:287_10: Catukkhattuṃ gamanāgamanenāti catukkhattuṃ gamanena ca āgamanena ca. Tenāha –
tika-s0303t0:288_0: Rūpameva asmīti vadatīti rūpakkhandhameva “asmī”ti gāhassa vatthuṃ katvā vadati. Adhigato taṇhāmāno.
tika-s0303t0:289_2: Tayo khārā viya tisso anupassanā cittasaṃkilesassa visodhanato.
tika-s0303t0:290_4: Vivaṭaṃ kātunti udāharaṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0303t0:290_7: Uttānakaṃ kātunti upanayanigamehi tamatthaṃ vibhūtaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0303t0:294_3: Niddosamevassa katvāti ādito anurūpattameva katvā saddhammaṃ kathessāmāti.
tika-s0303t0:295_1: Anattani sati anattakatāni kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantīti bhayaparitassanā ceva diṭṭhupādānañca uppajjati.
tika-s0303t0:295_4: Kasmā panetassa vipassanamanuyuñjantassa evaṃ ahosīti tattha kāraṇaṃ vadati “ayaṃ kirā”tiādinā.
tika-s0303t0:295_5: Evanti “ko nu kho me attā”ti evaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0303t0:295_6: Tāvatikā vissatthīti “mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desetū”ti vuttavissāso atthīti attho.
tika-s0303t0:298_0: 91-92. Etāni suttāni. Idhāgatānīti imasmiṃ vagge ānītāni saṅgītikārehīti.
tika-s0303t0:304_1: Catūhi gāhehīti “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinayappavattehi catūhi gāhehi.
tika-s0303t0:307_7: Kathaṃ karomīti kena pakārenāhaṃ bālaṃ ajānantaṃ karomi.
tika-s0303t0:310_1: Kenaci kāraṇena yujjhitvā gahetuṃ na sakkāti ayujjhā nāma.
tika-s0303t0:311_2: Anupubbena pavaḍḍhitvāti tattha tattha uṭṭhitānaṃ khuddakamahantānaṃ pheṇapiṇḍānaṃ saṃsaggena pakārato vuddhiṃ patvā.
tika-s0303t0:311_5: “Sāro nāma kiṃ bhaveyyā”ti vatvā sabbaso tadabhāvaṃ dassento “vilīyitvā viddhaṃseyyevā”ti āha.
tika-s0303t0:311_8: evaṃ asāratāyapi aniccatāsiddhīti aniccatāya eva niccasāraṃ thirabhāvasāraṃ dhuvasāraṃ sāmīnivāsīkārakabhūtassa
tika-s0303t0:311_12: Gahitopi upāyena tamatthaṃ na sādheti anarahattā.
tika-s0303t0:312_0: Byāmamattampi etarahi manussānaṃ vasena. Avassameva bhijjati taraṅgabbhāhataṃ hutvā.
tika-s0303t0:313_4: Tañhi saṃkaḍḍhitvā tato udakaṃ puṭaṃ karoti,
tika-s0303t0:313_12: Yasmā ghammakāle sūriyātapasantāpābhinibbattarasmijālanipāte tādise bhūmipadese ito cito samuggatavātavegasamuddhaṭaviruḷhasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0303t0:313_14: tasmā sabbaso sāravirahitāti vuttaṃ “saññāpi asārakaṭṭhena marīcisadisā”ti.
tika-s0303t0:313_15: Yasmā ca passantānaṃ yebhuyyena udakākārena khāyati,
tika-s0303t0:313_18: Phandatīti phandanākārappattā viya hoti appahīnataṇhassa puggalassa.
tika-s0303t0:313_25: yadidaṃ anudakameva udakaṃ katvā dassanaṃ anagarameva nagaraṃ katvā gandhabbanāṭakādidassanaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:314_0: Kukkukaṃ vuccati kadalikkhandhassa sabbapattavaṭṭīnaṃ abbhantare daṇḍakanti āha “akukkukajātanti anto asañjātaghanadaṇḍaka”nti.
tika-s0303t0:315_6: Aññadeva ca āgamanakāle cittanti idañca oḷārikavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:315_7: Tathā hi ekaccharakkhaṇe anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhāni cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti.
tika-s0303t0:315_12: Nanu ca saññāpi marīci viya vippalambheti vañceti,
tika-s0303t0:315_13: idampi viññāṇaṃ māyā viya vañcetīti ko imesaṃ visesoti?
tika-s0303t0:315_15: Tathāpi saññā anudakaṃyeva udakaṃ katvā gāhāpentī,
tika-s0303t0:315_16: apurisaññeva purisaṃ katvā gāhāpentī vippalambhanavasena appavisayā,
tika-s0303t0:315_17: viññāṇaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci ataṃsabhāvaṃ taṃ katvā dassentī māyā viya mahāvisayā.
tika-s0303t0:320_1: Sassataṃ sabbakālaṃ yāva kappavuṭṭhānā hontīti sassatiyo,
tika-s0303t0:320_10: “Na paññāyeyyā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “maggo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:324_1: Yaṃ mahāsamuddoti ettha yanti samayassa paccāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:324_3: So ca samayo ayanti dassento “pañcame sūriye uṭṭhite”ti āha.
tika-s0303t0:324_4: Paricchedaṃ na vadāmi paricchedakārikāya aggamaggavijjāya anadhigatattā.
tika-s0303t0:324_8: Puthujjanassa sakkāyānuparivattananti “santāne sattavohāro”ti taṃ tato aññaṃ katvā bhedena niddeso.

tika-s0303t0:328_15: Tatopi cittataranti tato cittakammatopi cittataraṃ cittakārena cintitappakārānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva cittakamme anipphajjanato.

tika-s0303t0:332_11: ekaṃso pana gahetabboti “aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:333_5: Ñāṇassa hi sabhāvato satinepakkato ca tikkhabhāvo,
tika-s0303t0:333_11: Anulomaṭṭhānassa hi vipassanā gahitagabbhā nāma tadā maggagabbhassa gahitattā.

tika-s0303t0:340_10: bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:340_11: Tathā hi dhammasaṅgahe “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ saññaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā saññāpi uddhaṭā.
tika-s0303t0:350_0: Tatiyampi tathevāti iminā “pañcakkhandhe catusaccavasena yojetvā”ti idaṃ upasaṃharati.

tika-s0303t0:353_16: Samatikkamitvā ṭhitanti pajahitvā ṭhitanti ayamettha attho.

tika-s0303t0:376_12: Suññato anattatoti ettha “parato”ti padassa saṅgaho kātabbo,
tika-s0303t0:379_4: Kammaṭṭhānassa uggahadhāraṇaparicayamanasikāravasena pavattañāṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānasutavasena nipphajjanato “suta”nti vuttaṃ.

tika-s0303t0:400_2: Pahānaṃ apassantoti therassa kira bhagavati pemaṃ adhimattaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:408_1: Mārasaddoyaṃ bhāvasādhanoti dassento “māro vā assāti maraṇaṃ vā bhaveyyā”ti āha.
tika-s0303t0:408_2: Māretāti maritabbo māraṃ maraṇaṃ etabboti āha “māretabbo”ti.
tika-s0303t0:408_3: Anupādānibbānatthāti phalavimuttisaṅkhātā arahato arahantatā nāma yāvadeva anupādānibbānatthā.
tika-s0303t0:408_4: Nibbānabbhantareti anupādānibbānādhigamassa abbhantare tato orameva idaṃ maggaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussati,

tika-s0303t0:428_1: Na ete vātāti ye ime rukkhasākhādibhañjanakarā,

tika-s0303t0:428_10: Ayañhi vāyu kāyassa niccataṃ abhinivissa ṭhito “mā ca aniccatā paro hotū”ti na vātā vāyantīti bādhati.
tika-s0303t0:428_13: Gabbho pana na nikkhamati kūṭaṭṭhādibhāveneva tassa labbhanato.
tika-s0303t0:428_15: evaṃ tiṭṭhanato lokassa pana tathā matimattanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t0:431_3: Mutaṃ gandhāyatanādi tividhaṃ sampattagāhīhi ghānādīhi patvā gahetabbato.
tika-s0303t0:431_4: Avasesāni cakkhādīni sattāyatanāni viññātaṃ nāma kevalaṃ manoviññāṇena vijānitabbato.
tika-s0303t0:431_6: yaṃ kiñci pāpuṇitabbaṃ pariyesitvā gavesitvā sampattanti anuppattaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:431_9: “Pattaṃ pariyesita”nti etasmiṃ padadvaye catukkaṃ sambhavatīti taṃ dassetvā tassa vasena pattapariyesitapadāni,
tika-s0303t0:431_10: tato manasā anuvicaritañca nīharitvā dassetuṃ “lokasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:431_11: Tattha pariyesitvā pattaṃ nāma pariyesanāya pariggāhabhāvato.
tika-s0303t0:431_12: Pariyesitaṃ nāma kevalaṃ pariyesitamevāti katvā pariyesitvā pattassa manussānuvicaritassa vuttattā.

tika-s0303t0:431_15: Tañhi manoviññāṇena gahitattā manasā anuvicaritaṃ nāma na diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:434_1: Dinnanti deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttanti āha “dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāyā”ti,

tika-s0303t0:435_1: Yathā pana mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ mattikāmayaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:435_6: Upagacchatīti pubbe bāhirapathavīkāyato tadekadesabhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattikabhāvappattiyā sattabhāvena
tika-s0303t0:435_7: saṇṭhitā idāni ghaṭādipathavī viya tameva bāhirapathavīkāyaṃ upeti upagacchati,
tika-s0303t0:435_8: sabbaso tena nibbisesataṃ ekībhāvameva gacchatīti attho.

tika-s0303t0:435_11: mahāvāyukhandhato niggatamahāvāyo viya tameva vāyukhandhaṃ upeti upagacchatīti diṭṭhigatiko sayameva attano vādaṃ bhindati.
tika-s0303t0:435_13: Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti tesaṃ visayabhāvā visayāpīti vadati.
tika-s0303t0:435_14: Visayiggahaṇena hi visayā gahitā eva hontīti.

tika-s0303t0:444_10: Tattha tattha gamananti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ vasena tāsu tāsu gatīsu upagamanaṃ.

tika-s0303t0:447_1: Akatāti samena vā visamena vā kenaci hetunā na katā eva.
tika-s0303t0:447_2: Kenaci kataṃ karaṇaṃ vidhānaṃ natthi etesanti akatavidhānā.
tika-s0303t0:447_3: Padadvayenapi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ abhinibbattitābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0303t0:447_4: Iddhiyāpi na nimmitāti kassaci iddhimato devassa brahmuno vā iddhiyāpi na nimmitā.
tika-s0303t0:447_7: Rūpasaddādayo hi pathavīkāyādīhi appaṭibaddhavuttikāti tassa laddhi.
tika-s0303t0:447_8: Yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ kassaci ca anibbattakaṃ,
tika-s0303t0:447_13: aññathā yato kutoci yassa kassaci uppatti siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t0:447_16: Vikārābhāvena hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā.
tika-s0303t0:447_19: Avipariṇāmadhammattā eva ca ne aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti.
tika-s0303t0:447_20: Sati hi vikāraṃ āpādetabbatāya byābādhakatāpi siyā,
tika-s0303t0:447_21: tathā anuggahetabbatāya anuggāhakatāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “nāla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:447_23: Jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārābhāvato na hantabbatā,
tika-s0303t0:447_24: na ghāṭetabbatā cāti neva koci hantā ghātetā vā.
tika-s0303t0:448_2: “Pañca ca kammuno satānī”ti padassa atthadassanaṃ “pañca kammasatāni cā”ti.
tika-s0303t0:448_3: Eseva nayoti iminā “kevalaṃ takkamattena niratthakadiṭṭhiṃ dīpetī”ti imameva atthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0303t0:448_4: Ettha ca takkamattakenāti iminā yasmā takkikā niraṅkusatāya parikappanassa yaṃ kiñci attano parikappitaṃ
tika-s0303t0:448_5: sārato maññamānā tatheva abhinivissa takkadiṭṭhigāhaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0303t0:448_6: tasmā na tesaṃ diṭṭhivatthūsu viññūhi vicāraṇā kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0303t0:449_5: Te kira “sacchandarāgā paribhuñjantī”ti adhippāyena catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādantīti vadanti.
tika-s0303t0:449_7: Yasmā te paṇītapaṇīte paccaye paṭisevantīti tassa micchāgāho.
tika-s0303t0:449_8: Ñāyaladdhepi paccaye paribhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomagāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadantīti apare.
tika-s0303t0:449_11: Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya hontīti kaṇṭakavuttikāti vuttā.
tika-s0303t0:449_14: Te kira ājīvakasamaye ājīvakaladdhiyā daḷhagāhitāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā.
tika-s0303t0:449_15: Nandādayo kira tathārūpaṃ ājīvakapaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0303t0:449_16: tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi ca paṇḍaratarā vuttā.
tika-s0303t0:450_2: Bhikkhu ca pannakotiādi tesaṃ pāḷi eva.
tika-s0303t0:450_6: attano vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhe jinitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0303t0:450_7: So kira tathābhūto dhammampi kassaci na katheti.
tika-s0303t0:450_9: Niṭṭhuhanādivippakāre kenaci katepi khamanavasena na kiñci vadatīti vadanti.
tika-s0303t0:450_10: Alābhinti “so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhātī”tiādinā nayena vuttaalābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ.
tika-s0303t0:450_11: Tato eva jighacchādubbalyaparetatāya sayanaparāyaṇaṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadanti.
tika-s0303t0:451_3: Bahū devāti cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena tesaṃ antarabhedavasena bahū devā.
tika-s0303t0:451_4: Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ ekacce antarabhedā mahāsamayasuttavasena dīpetabbā.
tika-s0303t0:453_0: Aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ sīlādinā paripāceti nāma sīghaṃyeva visuddhippattiyā.
tika-s0303t0:453_1: Paripakkaṃ kammaṃ phussa phussa patvā patvā kāle paripakkabhāvāpādanena byantī karoti nāma.
tika-s0303t0:453_3: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti upamāya sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva,
tika-s0303t0:453_7: sutte pana asati kuto gacchati suttaguḷaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0303t0:453_10: Kālavasenāti attani veṭhetvā ṭhitaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ yathāvuttassa kālassa vasena nibbeṭhiyamāno bālo ca paṇḍito ca paleti gacchati,
tika-s0303t0:460_0: Ārammaṇamevāti kasiṇasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇameva. Takkisaddena suddhatakkikānaṃ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:461_2: tasmiṃ sati tadupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti vuttaaniccadukkhavasenāti.
tika-s0303t0:461_4: Tiparivaṭṭavasenāti tehiyeva chabbīsatiyā suttehi catutthapeyyāle tiparivaṭṭavasena vuttoti yojanā.
tika-s0303t0:471_4: Itaro kāmaṃ upatāpanamalīnabhāvakaraṇavasena upakkileso lokuttarassa natthi,
tika-s0303t0:471_9: magganibbānānaṃ pana nekkhammabhāvo ukkaṃsato gahito evāti āha “nekkhammaninnanti navalokuttaradhammaninna”nti.
tika-s0303t0:474_1: Na evaṃ hotīti ettha “ahaṃ samāpajjāmī”ti vā,
tika-s0303t0:474_2: “ahaṃ samāpanno”ti vā mā hotu tadā tādisābhogābhāvato.
tika-s0303t0:474_4: Sabbathāpi na hotveva ahaṅkārassa sabbaso pahīnattā.
tika-s0303t0:478_3: Tattha tattha gamananti tesaṃ sāsanaharaṇavasena taṃ taṃ gāmantaradesantaraṃ.
tika-s0303t0:478_4: Evamārocesīti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanarahitaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ pemanīyaṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ therassa dhammakathaṃ
tika-s0303t0:478_5: sutvā pasannamānasā evaṃ “dhammikaṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā”tiādinā sāsanassa guṇasaṃkittanavācaṃ kulānaṃ ārocesi.
tika-s0303t0:482_4: Upapatitvā viyāti kutocipi avapatitvā viya nibbattā.
tika-s0303t0:485_1: Vissaṭṭhakāyāti “ye cammena vā rudhirena vā aṭṭhinā vā atthikā,
tika-s0303t0:485_2: te sabbaṃ gaṇhantū”ti tattha nirapekkhacittatāya adhiṭṭhitasīlatāya pariccattasarīrā.
tika-s0303t0:488_9: Anuddharaṇīyanāgāti ānubhāvamahantatāya ca vasanaṭṭhānaviduggatāya ca uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyā nāgā.
tika-s0303t0:488_10: Te “sattavidhā”ti vatvā sarūpato vasanaṭṭhānato ca dassento “kambalassatarā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t0:488_11: Tattha kambalassatarā dhataraṭṭhāti ime jātivasena vuttā.
tika-s0303t0:488_16: Te nāge koci supaṇṇo uddharituṃ na sakkotīti sambandho.
tika-s0303t0:488_19: tattha ca vuttanayeneva attho veditabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t0:490_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhagacchalatānaṃ mūlaṃ paṭicca pavatto gandho mūlagandho,
tika-s0303t0:490_11: Taṃ nissāyāti taṃ mūlagandhaṃ rukkhaṃ paccayaṃ katvā nibbattā.
tika-s0303t0:490_13: mūlameva vā tesaṃ paccayoti dassento “so hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t0:490_19: idha pana sabbaso gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo.
tika-s0303t0:490_21: Soti so sabbo mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma.
tika-s0303t0:490_22: Tassa gandhassa gandheti tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe.
tika-s0303t0:490_23: Sarikkhaṃ sadisaṃ paṭidānaṃ etissāti sarikkhadānaṃ, patthanā.
tika-s0303t0:492_1: Lokaṃ vālentā saṃvarantā chādentā ahanti pariyesantīti valāhā,
tika-s0303t0:492_12: Abbhaṃ uppajjatīti tahaṃ tahaṃ paṭalaṃ uṭṭhahati.
tika-s0303t0:492_17: Tadā hi viddho vigatavalāhako devo bhavituṃ yutto.
tika-s0303t0:493_4: Aññenapi kaṇhapāpikasattānaṃ pāpakammapaccayā uppannavināsameghena vuṭṭhena so so deso vinassateva.
tika-s0303t0:495_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana imameva atthaṃ hetuatthena karaṇavacanena dassetuṃ “aññāṇenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t0:495_4: Sabbānīti “aññāṇā adassanā anabhisamayā”tiādīni padāni ekādasasu suttesu āgatāni,
tika-s0303t0:495_5: pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgatattā.
tika-s0303t0:498_2: Tayidaṃ samādhikosallattaṃ saha jhānaṅgayogena catubbidho jhānasamādhi,
tika-s0303t0:498_3: tasmā taṃ taṃ vibhāgaṃ jānantassa siddhaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0303t0:498_8: upekkhekaggatāvasena catutthaṃ duvaṅgikamevāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne taṃtaṃaṅgānaṃ vavatthāne kusalo.
tika-s0303t0:498_11: Kallaṃ katvāti samādhānassa paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇañca samādhānena samāpajjane cittaṃ samatthaṃ katvā.
tika-s0303t0:498_13: Tatiyādīsu nayesu akusalopi jhānatthāya paṭipannattā “jhāyītevā”ti vutto.
tika-s0303t0:501_1: Dutiyādisuttesu ṭhitikusaloti ettha antogadhahetuattho ṭhiti- saddo,
tika-s0303t0:501_4: Sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattanti sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti adhiṭṭhānavasībhāvassa anipphāditattā.
tika-s0303t0:501_5: Yathāparicchedena kālena vuṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti vuṭṭhānavasībhāvassa anipphāditattā.
tika-s0303t0:501_7: tasmiṃ kallite kallitabhāvena kasiṇārammaṇesu “idaṃ nāma asukassā”ti visayavasena samāpajjituṃ asakkonto na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo.
tika-s0303t0:501_8: Na samādhismiṃ gocarakusaloti samādhismiṃ nipphāditabbe tassa gocare kammaṭṭhānasaññite pavattiṭṭhāne
tika-s0303t0:501_12: evaṃ bahulīkātabba’nti ajānanto tattha akusalo nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0303t0:501_13: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhinīharitunti kammaṭṭhānaṃ visesabhāgiyatāya abhinīharituṃ akusalo.
tika-s0303t0:501_18: saddena sakkaccakāripadādīnaṃyeva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo catukkānaṃ vuttattā.
tika-s0303t0:501_21: Na hi lokuttaradhammesu akosallaṃ nāma labbhati.
